COURSES

The Glasgow School of Art offers a wide range of courses for adults and children. Courses have been designed for those who wish to explore their creativity, learn about a new subject for the first time or build upon existing skills. We also offer portfolio preparation courses aimed at those who are considering entry to art school or a similar course of study.

The courses are offered in a wide variety of ways; through the Autumn and Spring programme of evening and day courses, one-off weekend courses, Easter Break courses and the Summer School.

Find out more about our range of courses using the links to the left. To find full details of the courses on offer, please download the current brochure.

The programme of courses is held on on the School's main campus in the city centre. Students are provided with teaching of the highest quality. Tutors are mainly members of the teaching staff of the School or lecturers drawn from a wider artistic field.
